typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceCode as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,
		CountryRegionCode as string,
		EnglishCountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceGeogrpaphy
source(output(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBGeography
source(output(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceLastSatGeography
SourceGeogrpaphy derive(HUB_Geography_HK = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey),
		LOAD_TS = currentTimestamp(),
		SAT_Geography_HDIFF = sha2(512, GeographyAlternateKey,City,StateProvinceCode,StateProvinceName,CountryRegionCode,EnglishCountryRegionName,PostalCode)) ~> HashColumns
HashColumns, HUBGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == HUBGeography@HUB_Geography_HK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CheckNewHUBGeography
CheckNewHUBGeography select(mapColumn(
		GeographyAlternateKey,
		HUB_Geography_HK,
		LOAD_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewHUBGeography
HashColumns, SourceLastSatGeography exists(HashColumns@HUB_Geography_HK == SourceLastSatGeography@HUB_Geography_HK
	&& HashColumns@SAT_Geography_HDIFF == SourceLastSatGeography@SAT_Geography_HDIFF,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CheckNewSatGeography
NewHUBGeography sink(input(
		HUB_Geography_HK as string,
		GeographyAlternateKey as string,
		LOAD_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkHUBGeography
